Core:Properties.Core:Property: (\{ "00:24 [CM:Skotos\|Aeval] \\"This is fantastic...\\"", "00:25 [Skotos\|Azrael] \\"The gender swap does help the kinda-pretty-rapey-sort-of-christmas-song, doesn't it?\\"", "00:26 [CM:Skotos\|Aeval] \\"Lol, yeah it does help lesson the creep factor but I still love that song\\"", "00:28 [Skotos\|Azrael] \\"Totally! Because, y'know, we're all adults and don't have to behave like characters from songs :)\\"", "00:28 [Skotos\|Azrael] \\"Otherwise, we really have to arrest pretty much every rap artist for instigating crimes\\"", "00:29 [Skotos\|Topsy] \\"#preach\\"", "00:29 [Skotos] \\"Topsy hearts Azrael lots.\\"", "00:30 [Skotos\|Azrael] \\"And I don't even have to pay her much to say that!\\"", "00:30 [Skotos\|Topsy] \\"Gimme mah stps, boi! ;)\\"", "00:31 [Skotos\|Azrael] \\"But once you've got them, you won't need me anymore!\\"", "00:31 [CM:Skotos\|Aeval] \\"Well, sometimes they get arrested ;)\\"", "00:32 [Skotos\|Topsy] \\"Always need the bossman.\\"", "00:33 [CM:Skotos\|Aeval] \\"Oh come on, how many stps? ;)\\"", "00:35 [CM:Skotos\|Aeval] \\"Loving these Tony Bennett videos btw\\"", "02:28 [Skotos] \\"Azrael waves\\"", "02:30 [CM:Skotos\|Kurzon] \\" 'lo\\"", "02:40 [Skotos\|Azrael] \\"How goes?\\"", "02:40 [CM:Skotos\|Kurzon] \\"Tired. Why do you stay up so late?\\"", "02:41 [Skotos\|Azrael] \\"He asks, showing his age...\\"", "02:42 [Skotos\|Azrael] \\"Had the day off today. Australia day. Leaving for my weekly RP game soon.\\"", "02:42 [CM:Skotos\|Kurzon] \\"Was playin', and then I got coding.\\"", "02:42 [CM:Skotos\|Kurzon] \\"One more thing, I tell myself. I'll just fix this last thing.\\"", "02:42 [CM:Skotos\|Kurzon] \\"The lies I tell myself.\\"", "02:43 [CM:Skotos\|Kurzon] \\"I have the day off too or I wouldn't be up.\\"", "02:44 [Skotos\|Azrael] \\"Ah, I know it well. \\"I'll do this task, it'll take half an hour\\" and then get distracted on other things first, and then do the task and it takes three hours, and then...\\"", "02:44 [Skotos\|Azrael] \\"But hey, the NPCs in ICO now should be able to kill PCs. So that's progress.\\"", "02:44 [CM:Skotos\|Kurzon] \\"Any time we find new ways to kill PCs it's progress.\\"", "02:45 [Skotos\|Azrael] \\"Progress, plus an @assist or forum post from at least one or two players threatening to quit.\\"", "02:45 [CM:Skotos\|Kurzon] \\"Do your guys still do that? My players have just ceded defeat and accepted their deaths when they come.\\"", "02:48 [CM:Skotos\|Aeval] \\"I am so about leaving blood splatter behind too, btw \<.\<\\"", "02:48 [Skotos\|Azrael] \\"Yeah, some do. But we have competing factions, so often it's more about who won, rather than that they lost.\\"", "02:49 [Skotos\|Azrael] \\"If a monster comes in and kills PCs, there is usually less complaints\\"", "02:49 [Skotos\|Azrael] \\"Yay Aeval!
